mapper.select: SELECT T.TK_NO , T.TK_CTGR , T.TK_LCTN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.TK_START_YMD, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TK_START_YMD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.TK_FINISH_YMD, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TK_FINISH_YMD , T.POSTER_FILE , T.TK_VPRICE , T.TK_RPRICE , T.TK_SPRICE , T.TK_RUNTIME , T.TK_LCTN_ADDRESS , TD.TK_DETAIL_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(td.tk_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tk_ymd , TD.TK_ROUND , G.GDS_NO , G.GDS_TYPE , G.GDS_NM , G.UNIT_PRICE , G.EXPLN , G.PIC , G.COMM_CODE_GRP_NO , G.REG_DT , G.ART_GROUP_NO , G.ART_NO , G.FILE_GROUP_NO , F.FILE_SN , F.FILE_GROUP_NO , F.FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME , F.FILE_SAVE_NAME , F.FILE_SAVE_LOCATE , F.FILE_SIZE , F.FILE_SAVE_DATE , (SELECT TF.FILE_SAVE_LOCATE FROM FILE_DETAIL TF WHERE TF.FILE_GROUP_NO = T.POSTER_FILE) AS TK_FILE_SAVE_LOCATE ,(SELECT AG.ART_GROUP_NM FROM ARTIST_GROUP AG WHERE AG.ART_GROUP_NO = G.ART_GROUP_NO) AS ART_GROUP_NM ,(SELECT A.ART_ACT_NM FROM ARTIST A WHERE A.ART_NO = G.ART_NO) AS ART_ACT_NM FROM GOODS G LEFT JOIN TICKET T ON G.GDS_NO = T.GDS_NO LEFT JOIN TK_DETAIL TD ON T.TK_NO = TD.TK_NO LEFT JOIN FILE_GROUP FG ON G.FILE_GROUP_NO = FG.FILE_GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN FILE_DETAIL F ON F.FILE_GROUP_NO = FG.FILE_GROUP_NO WHERE G.GDS_NO = #{gdsNo} ORDER BY tk_ymd, TK_ROUND

SELECT s.seat_no ,s.seat_grade ,s.tk_lctn ,s.seat_floor ,s.seat_section ,s.seat_row ,s.seat_detail_no ,tr.rsvtn_enum FROM seat s LEFT JOIN tk_rsvtn tr ON s.seat_no = tr.seat_no AND tr.tk_detail_no =#{tkDetailNo} ORDER BY s.seat_no

SELECT td.tk_detail_no , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(td.tk_ymd, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS tk_ymd , td.tk_round , td.tk_no , td.gds_nm , t.gds_no , t.tk_vprice , t.tk_rprice , t.tk_sprice , (SELECT F.FILE_SAVE_LOCATE FROM FILE_DETAIL F WHERE F.FILE_GROUP_NO = T.POSTER_FILE) AS TK_FILE_SAVE_LOCATE FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN tk_detail td ON td.tk_no = t.tk_no LEFT JOIN FILE_DETAIL F ON F.FILE_GROUP_NO = T.POSTER_FILE WHERE t.tk_no=#{tkNo}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO tk_rsvtn tkr USING (SELECT #{tkDetailNo} AS tk_detail_no, #{seatNo} AS seat_no FROM dual) src ON ( tkr.tk_detail_no = src.tk_detail_no AND tkr.seat_no = src.seat_no ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tkr.rsvtn_enum = 1, tkr.rsvtn_dt = SYSDATE, tkr.mem_no = #{memNo} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( tk_rsvtn, rsvtn_dt, rsvtn_enum, mem_no, tk_detail_no, seat_no ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(tk_rsvtn),0)+1 FROM tk_rsvtn), SYSDATE, 1, #{memNo}, #{tkDetailNo}, #{seatNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tk_rsvtn SET rsvtn_enum =0 WHERE rsvtn_enum =1 AND rsvtn_dt < SYSDATE -(1/2880)
mapper.select: SELECT cr.reply_no , cr.reply_content , TO_CHAR(cr.reply_create_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS rep_create_date , cr.mem_no , cr.tk_no , (SELECT m.mem_last_name || m.mem_first_name FROM member m WHERE m.mem_no = cr.mem_no) AS mem_nm FROM community_reply cr WHERE 1=1 AND cr.tk_no = #{tkNo} AND reply_delyn ='N' ORDER BY rep_create_date DESC
